A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a movie it fails on following fundamental plot guidelines for building suspense and interest towards a climax.  As a Star Wars store it fails horribly at ignoring the cliffhangers from the previous movie\, and for having the characters things against their character and against Star Wars canon.  After being a Star Wars fan my entire life\, episode 8 is causing me to lose interest in the characters\, the force and the plot.
